   16: 
   17: -module(metrics_register_SUITE).
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   21: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   22: 
   23: -define(WAIT_TIME, 500).
   24: -define(RT_WAIT_TIME, 60000).
   25: 
   26: -import(metrics_helper, [assert_counter/2,
   27:                       get_counter_value/1]).
   28: 
   29: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   30: %% Suite configuration
   31: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   32: 
   33: all() ->
   34:     [{group, registration}].
   35: 
   36: groups() ->
   37:     [{registration, [sequence], [register,
   38:                                  unregister]}].
   39: 
   40: suite() ->
   41:     [{require, ejabberd_node} | escalus:suite()].
   42: 
   43: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   44: %% Init & teardown
   45: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   46: 
   47: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   48:     escalus:init_per_suite(Config).
   49: 
   50: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   51:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   52: 
   53: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   54:     Config.
   55: 
   56: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
   57:     ok.
   58: 
   59: init_per_testcase(unregister, Config) ->
   60:     Alice = escalus_users:get_user_by_name(alice),
   61:     escalus_users:create_user(Config, Alice),
   62:     Config;
   63: init_per_testcase(registered_users, Config) ->
   64:     XMPPDomain = ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
   65:     case escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_config, get_local_option,
   66:                               [{auth_method, XMPPDomain}]) of
   67:         external ->
   68:             {skip, "counter not supported with ejabberd_auth_external"};
   69:         anonymous ->
   70:             {skip, "counter not supported with anonymous authentication"};
   71:         _ ->
   72:             Config
   73:     end;
   74: init_per_testcase(_CaseName, Config) ->
   75:     Config.
   76: 
   77: end_per_testcase(unregister, _Config) ->
   78:     ok;
   79: end_per_testcase(_CaseName, Config) ->
   80:     Alice = escalus_users:get_user_by_name(alice),
   81:     escalus_users:delete_user(Config, Alice).
   82: 
   83: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   84: %% Registration tests
   85: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   86: 
   87: register(Config) ->
   88:     {value, Registarations} = get_counter_value(modRegisterCount),
   89: 
   90:     Alice = escalus_users:get_user_by_name(alice),
   91:     escalus_users:create_user(Config, Alice),
   92: 
   93:     assert_counter(Registarations + 1, modRegisterCount).
   94: 
   95: 
   96: unregister(Config) ->
   97:     {value, Deregistarations} = get_counter_value(modUnregisterCount),
   98: 
   99:     Alice = escalus_users:get_user_by_name(alice),
  100:     escalus_users:delete_user(Config, Alice),
  101: 
  102:     assert_counter(Deregistarations + 1, modUnregisterCount).
  103:
